name: Crystal Protector
desc:
Pendulum Effect
Each turn, the first "Crystal Beast" card(s), "Rainbow Dragon(s)" and/or "Rainbow Dark Dragon(s)" you control that would be destroyed by a card effect, is not destroyed.

Monster Effect
During damage calculation (in either player's turn), if a "Crystal Beast" monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can Tribute this card from your hand or field; your battling monster's ATK and DEF each become double its original ATK and DEF during that damage calculation only, but it is destroyed at the end of this Damage Step.
